about_the_game:
ATTN YOUTUBE STREAMERS AND REVIEWERS: We welcome all streams and reviews of the Shattered Souls Demo! Please be aware that we've licensed two songs that are under Content ID on Youtube (ONLY). You will NOT receive a copyright strike or any penalties for streaming or reviewing the demo. However, you may receive a notice of copyright content. If you would like this notice removed, please email us with your Youtube channel name. Our composer will take the Content ID claim off your channel.



Summary:

Celeste finds herself fighting for her life after enduring a betrayal that no one should experience. As she nears her final breath, she is whisked away to a different world: Remoire. Things are not as they seem, though. She’s not a mortal. Her past is as vast as the ocean. Her soul is fractured and barely holding together from the traumas she’s faced and forgotten. She must heal herself or even the tiniest tragedy could shatter her. But she’s not the only one who is broken. Join Celeste as she fights not only to save her own life, but to change the lives of those around her.

The Shattered Souls demo takes place at the start of it all. Enjoy a portion of the common route from the main game! Meet the love interests who are fated to you and swear to seek revenge on those who've harmed you.

What can I expect from this demo?
1. Fully-Voiced
2. Intricate lip animations that match with the characters audio
3. Gorgeous illustrations for each of the love interests
4. Unique and beautiful compositions to set the mood
5. Dynamic gameplay
6. Demo exclusive unlockable achievements
7. Around 1-2 hours of gameplay (depending on your playthrough speed - NOTE: May be less if audio lines are being skipped)
8. Fully functioning UI with gorgeous designs and an unlockable CG gallery

What this demo does NOT include:
1. Unlockable routes
2. The complete common route for the main game
3. Finalized character designs [Some character designs may be different in the final version of the game]
4. All supporting character sprites [Some voiced supporting characters do not appear in this game. They will in the main game]
detailed_description:
Our Kickstarter is LIVE!

Want to know what happens next on your journey for vengeance? We want to tell you!

Check out our Kickstarter Campaign for more information!



If you're able, please consider backing the Kickstarter campaign! Not only will you get the full-game (at the discounted Kickstarter price), but we have lots of adorable digital and physical merch items, plus cool exclusives like: early access, name an npc, become an npc, & even getting a fully-customized DLC scene made exclusively for you!

If you cannot/do not wish to back the campaign but would still like to help make this game possible, please share the demo and/or let us know your thoughts!

How can we improve? What did you love most about the demo? Who is your favorite Fated? We love hearing from you and highly value your input.

Thank you so much for playing the Shattered Souls Demo and for your support!

- Eternal Love Studios Team

reviews:
“I really enjoyed this demo! The tone, the atmosphere, the lore and the mature harem really clicked with me! I’m hoping the funding for this game succeeds because gosh, I need to know more about its lore, most especially the [REDACTED]. You’ll understand my plight once you play the demo! HAHA Seriously, please play it! 😩”
Otome Kitten

“...with Shattered Souls, I feel like I can go for almost all the routes just by pure curiosity as to what will happen with Celeste’s Fated and her goal. Will they help her accomplish it no questions asked? Will they get into a whirlpool they can’t get back from? Will she succeed in everything?! I need to know! In my opinion, is quite refreshing to have these types of stories in the visual novel sphere catching more eyes as of late. As you might have guessed, I’ve already gone and backed the Kickstarter. Don’t take my word for it, but download the demo, have a nice 1-2 hours (in company of the music), and decide by yourself who your true Fated will be.”
Hyphen
short_description: Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned, and you will not forget the betrayals inflicted upon you. With a mark that ties your fate to seven men, you’re determined to lay waste those who tried to shatter you. Will you try again?
